index.description: OSSWallet allows you to make fast and secure blockchain-based payments without intermediaries.

seed-creating.description: Get ready to write down the secret key. This is the only way to regain access to the wallet. It is safest not to store the key on the devices.
seed-creating.no-seed-error: Sorry we can't generate seed, go back and try again

seed-checking.description: To make sure you spelled the words correctly, enter words

seed-back-uping.description: Write these 12 words in exactly that order and hide them in a safe place.

connect-wallet.description: To restore access, enter the 12 secret words you received when creating a wallet
connect-wallet.scannned-error: Scanned Seed is not valid try other
connect-wallet.format-error: Seed Phrase does not have correct format, make sure to put 12 word and remove extra spaces

password-setup.description: We will use your passcode for secure your seed phrase, so create strong passcode
password-setup.password-setup-description: We will use your passcode for secure your seed phrase, so create strong passcode
password-setup.password-min-length: Passcode must contain at least 8 characters

index.no-custom-tokens-alert: Custom tokens havenâ€™t been added. You can search for tokens or add them manually
index.search-input-placeholder: Search by name or paste address

add-custom-token.warning-second: Anyone can create a token, including creating fake versions of existing tokens that claim to represent projects.
add-custom-token.warning-third: If you purchase this token, you may not be able to sell it back.
add-custom-token.warning-forth: Buy adding this as a custom token, you confirm that all further interactions with it are at your own risk.

recieve-details.warning: Do not send other blockchain network here!

send.warning: Check address before send, you cen't refund it

swap-in-progress.description: Your transaction has been sent to the network and will be processed in a few seconds
